title: Hilarious
review: One of my favorite movies..It's unique..Todd Phillips is a great director and this movies cast is perfect..It's cool it takes place in Vegas..It's the Wolfpack..

title: Boring and disappointing
review: This movie has an outstanding cast..But in my opinion this movie was very boring..Alot more stuff could have happened..Waste of opportunities.

title: Disappointed
review: Way to heavy on the music...Not enough action.. Could have been better.

title: Classic
review: If you like football you will like this..in my opinion it had great acting.. It is Inspirational..Motivational..Well rounded movie..Classic.

title: Incredible dose of reality
review: Now this is how you make a movie..This is how you act..This is an amazing film..Joker is just incredible.. Masterpiece is an understatement..
